ValidationRule.description: Check the following: LastUpdatedFromKafka__c is not set to blank LastUpdatedFromKafka__c is not set to an older date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISNEW(), false, IF( ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(INT_LastUpdatedFromKafka__c)), false, ( ISBLANK(INT_LastUpdatedFromKafka__c) || INT_LastUpdatedFromKafka__c < PRIORVALUE(INT_LastUpdatedFromKafka__c) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Last updated from Kafka can only be updated to a newer date.
